content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as the central storage depot.
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-3.0, y=19.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron plates (fuel inventory: 7 coal; energy: 1600.0).
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-4.0, y=21.0) processing copper ore into copper plates (warns “out of fuel” with residual copper-ore).

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (x=-7.5, y=18.5) configured for automation research with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 17} and electrical_id 2649.
- Boiler at position (x=-5.5, y=24.0) which now reports NO_FUEL (warning: “out of fuel”), with an empty fuel inventory, energy 0.0, connection points at (x=-7.5, y=24.5) and (x=-3.5, y=24.5), and a water-filled fluid box.
- Generator (Steam Engine) at position (x=-0.5, y=24.5) that is NOT_CONNECTED (warnings: “not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”), energy 0.0, and connection points at (x=-0.5, y=22.0) and (x=-0.5, y=27.0).
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-7.5, y=25.5) operating normally.
- An Electricity Group comprising several small electric poles (e.g., near positions (x=-0.5, y=11.5), (x=-7.5, y=15.5), (x=-4.5, y=15.5), etc.) with voltage 0.
- Pipe Groups forming the fluid network:
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2984) at position (x=-10.5, y=16.5) with status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2985) at position (x=-12.5, y=18.5) with status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2987, fluid=water) at position (x=-8.5, y=20.5) with status FULL_OUTPUT.
   • PipeGroup (fluid_system=2989) at position (x=-2.5, y=21.5) with status EMPTY.

### Copper Cable Factory at position (x=1.5, y=19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- AssemblingMachine1 at position (x=1.5, y=19.5) running the copper-cable recipe; it now has electrical_id 2649, status NO_POWER, and warnings indicating “not receiving electricity” plus “cannot create copper-cable due to missing resources: copper-plate (1)”.
- Output Chest at position (x=1.5, y=21.5) operating normally for copper-cable dispatch.
- Dedicated Copper Buffer Chest at position (x=-5.5, y=21.5) that was successfully placed (after an initial placement error) and currently holds Inventory({'copper-plate': 1}).

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────
- Dedicated Chest Placement and Variable Initialization:
  • When attempting to place a dedicated chest, ensure the target location is unobstructed. The initial placement at (–4.0, 22.0) failed due to collision with existing objects; selecting the nearest buildable area (–5.5, 21.5) proved successful.
  • Define and initialize the chest variable (e.g., buffer_chest) before attempting inventory operations to avoid NameError issues.

- Automated Supply Chain Setup for the Assembling Machine:
  • Verify that functions for finding a buildable area are invoked with the required parameters; errors such as “missing 1 required positional argument: 'center_position'” or “'Position' object is not callable” indicate parameter mismatches.
  • Ensure that all variables (such as input_chest_pos, input_chest, and inserter) are properly defined and assigned before use to prevent repeated NameError exceptions.
  • Check that the necessary items (e.g., a wooden chest in inventory) are available prior to placement, as failure to do so leads to placement errors (e.g., “No wooden_chest in inventory”).
